name: Reflex (itch) (Prado Studios)
description:
Reflex is your new favorite shooter.

It's in a very early development stage, but already has a defined roadmap for the next updates:

  • Sound effects (the game is so quiet right now)
  • New arenas (should have more  than one already)
  • Local multiplayer (it's always better to win from a living person)
  • Online multiplayer (maybe?)

I'm developing this game during my free time (which is not much) and I hope you enjoy it. If you do, please let me know.
